answers.author: Timothy Wolff
answers.text:
We have contracted out all of our street plowing for years.  We do a little in house with a pick-up for parking lots and cleaning out mailboxes, but that is it.

author: David Rowlands
text: I'm looking for information/examples/RFP's from communities which have successfully contracted all or part of your snow removal.
title: Contracting Out Snow Removal
